# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power source before using it.
### Errors when using entities without being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before using them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Ensure that belt groups have items before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
